Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?

Message: The user completes the submission of the form

I'm sorry to hear that your account is not running. Could you please provide more details about the issue? Are you experiencing problems with your ad campaigns or is there an issue with accessing your account? This will help me assist you better.

To help you get your account running, let's start by checking a few things:
1. **Account Verification**: If your account is new, it might be pending verification. Please ensure you've provided all necessary details for business verification. You can email the following information to adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification:
   - Company's full address
   - Company's legal entity name
   - Company's EHID or DUNS number
   - Primary contact person's name
   - Company's phone number
2. **Ad Campaign Settings**: Check if your ad campaigns are set up correctly with the right targeting, budget, and bidding type.
3. **Recent Changes**: Have there been any recent changes in the last 72 hours that might affect your campaigns?
If you've checked these and still face issues, please let me know so I can assist you further.
Hello! How can I assist you today?
I have flagged ads for celebrity endorsement
Celebrity endorsements can be tricky due to specific guidelines. Could you let me know if your account is new or if there have been any recent changes? This will help me assist you better.
but there are not celebrities in my ads

It sounds like there might be a misunderstanding with the ad review process. I recommend reviewing our Ad Policy and Guidelines to ensure everything aligns with our standards. You can find the details here: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). If you believe your ad was flagged in error, please let me know, and we can look into it further.

Thanks for providing your account ID. If you believe your ad was flagged incorrectly, you can submit an appeal by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line 'Urgent: Ad Rejected - Action Required.' Make sure to include your account ID and any relevant details about the issue. You can also review our guidelines here: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). Let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with!
